title: Verify: Selecting MLB.TV app icon successfully opens the MLB.TV HTML 5 app
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has setup their HTML 5 device
AND the "MLB.TV" app is present in the device Apps Menu
custom_steps: WHEN the user selects MLB.TV from the device Apps menu
custom_expected: THEN the MLB.TV app will open successfully

title: Verify: MLB.TV can be accessed while the HTML5 device is connected wirelessly
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has setup their HTML 5 device
AND their HTML 5 device is currently connected to a wireless network
AND the "MLB.TV" app is present in the device Apps Menu
custom_steps: WHEN the user selects MLB.TV from the device Apps menu
custom_expected: THEN the MLB.TV app will open successfully

title: Verify: MLB.TV can be accessed while the HTML5 device is connected using a wired connection
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has setup their HTML 5 device
AND the "MLB.TV" app is present in the device Apps Menu
custom_steps: WHEN the user selects MLB.TV from the device Apps menu
custom_expected: THEN the MLB.TV app will open successfully

Free User / Non-Entitlement account is allowed to Log into Application
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the MLB.TV app has been accessed
AND a Free MLB.com User account has been created
custom_steps:
WHEN the user enters a Free MLB.com User account (upon Login request)
AND enters the Free MLB.com User account password
custom_expected: Free User / Non- Entitlement account is allowed to Log into Application

title: Free User / Non-Entitlement account is allowed to play FGOTD Live/VOD archive
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the MLB.TV app has been accessed
AND the user is logged in with a Free User / Non- Entitlement account
custom_steps:
WHEN the user selects Any Date (up to and including Today's FGOTD file) that contains FGOTD Assets
AND navigates through the Content File Thumbnails for FGOTD assets
THEN presses select to ENTER and PLAY the FGOTD media content
custom_expected: Playback will be initiated for any/all available FGOTD Live/VOD archive file(s)

title: FGOTD Ads trigger - Pre-Roll Ads Playback
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the MLB.TV app has been accessed
AND the user is logged in with a Free User / Non- Entitlement account
custom_steps:
WHEN the user selects Any Date (up to and including Today's FGOTD file) that contains FGOTD Assets
AND navigates through the Content File Thumbnails for FGOTD assets
THEN presses select to ENTER and PLAY the FGOTD media content
custom_expected: FGOTD Asset must Show Freewheel served pre-roll video ads to user before Playback begins

title: Trigger - Replay Ads Playback (if applicable)
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the MLB.TV app has been accessed
AND the user is logged in with a Free User / Non- Entitlement account
custom_steps:
WHEN the user navigates through Content Files 
AND the user selects Any previous Game Date that contains Game Replay Assets from previously played games 
THEN presses select to ENTER and PLAY the Replay media content
custom_expected: Replay Asset must Show Freewheel served video ads to user before Replay playback begins

title: Trigger - Game Highlights Ads Playback (if applicable)
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the MLB.TV app has been accessed
AND the user is logged in with a Free User / Non- Entitlement account
custom_steps:
WHEN the user navigates through Content Files 
AND the user selects Any previous Game Date that contains Game Highlights Assets from previously played games 
THEN presses select to ENTER and PLAY the Game Highlight media content
custom_expected: Game Highlight Asset must Show Freewheel served video ads to user before Game Highlight playback begins

title: Non-FGOTD Gameday Sign-in Notification for Free User/Non-Entitlement account

THEN presses select to ENTER and PLAY the MLB.TV Game media content

title: Premium Annual account entitlement is allowed to play ALL Live/VOD archive games
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the MLB.TV app has been accessed
AND the user is logged in with a Premium Yearly account
custom_steps:

AND navigates through the Content File Thumbnails for Game Content Assets
THEN presses select to ENTER and PLAY the MLB.TV Game media content
custom_expected: THE Premium Annual account entitlement is allowed to play ALL Live/VOD archive games

Wired Connection: Launch and playback
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have the MLB.TV HTML5 device connected to a wired network connection
AND the user has accessed the "MLB.TV" Application
custom_steps:
WHEN the USER locates any game media content file
AND the USER attempts to play ANY game media content file
custom_expected:
THEN the game media video stream will launch successfully
AND the game media content file will play without issue

title: Wireless Connection: Launch and playback
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have the MLB.TV HTML5 device connected to a wireless network connection
AND the user has accessed the "MLB.TV" Application
custom_steps:
WHEN the USER locates any game media content file
AND the USER attempts to play ANY game media content file
custom_expected:
THEN the game media video stream will launch successfully
AND the game media content file will play without issue

title: Full VOD Archive Playback to Exit
custom_preconds: GIVEN we have accessed the "MLB.TV" application
custom_steps:
WHEN we launch ANY ARCHIVE/VOD video feed with a TRT > 2mins
AND watch to completion
custom_expected:
THEN playback will commence and continue without stalls or skips
AND the user will not be kicked out of the stream unexpectedly
AND upon completion the app will return to Schedule (asset) page

title: Full Live Game Linear Playback to Exit
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have accessed the "MLB.TV" application
AND the USER is signed in with a Premium Monthly OR Yearly account entitlement
custom_steps:
WHEN we launch ANY LIVE video feed with a TRT > 2mins
AND watch to completion
custom_expected:
THEN playback will commence and continue without stalls or skips
AND the user will not be kicked out of the stream unexpectedly
AND upon completion the app will return to Schedule (asset) page

title: Seek FWD to Exit - VOD Archive
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have accessed the "MLB.TV" application
AND the USER is signed in with a Premium Monthly OR Yearly account entitlement
custom_steps:
WHEN the USER launches a VOD Archive video feed
AND seek to the END of video
custom_expected: THEN the video will transition from playback and return to the Schedule (asset) page gracefully

title: Seek BACK (RWD) to Front of Program
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have accessed the "MLB.TV" application
AND the USER is signed in with a Premium Monthly OR Yearly account entitlement
custom_steps:
WHEN the USER launches a VOD Archive video feed
AND seek FWD > 10 mins into program
AND allow > 30 secs of playback
AND seek BACK (RWD) to head of program
custom_expected: THEN the video will resume playback from beginning and continue without issue

title: Network: Verify bandwidth/stream quality adapts with network fluctuations
Network: Verify video quality improves with connectivity improvement
Network: Verify when throttling connection strength that bitrate playback adjusts without issue in both directions
Notification Triggered - Timing
custom_preconds:
* QA build is installed and launched
* In the QA environment at least two video feeds are playable
* User is entitled to view both feeds with no blackouts blocking either one
* One of the feeds is being strung and a compatible event is about to occur
custom_steps:
1. While playing a live game full screen, trigger the tvOS supported event on the other game via stringer.
2. Quickly confirm alert is fired: http://gd.qa.mlb.com/components/game/mlb/notifications.json (this is the QA version of the Notifications .json file)
3. After triggered alert is confirmed, wait for the Notification to appear in-app
custom_expected: The notification appears within 2 minutes

title: Notification Triggered - Appearance
custom_preconds:
* QA build is installed and launched
* In the QA environment at least two video feeds are playable
* User is entitled to view both feeds with no blackouts blocking either one
* One of the feeds is being strung and a compatible event is about to occur
custom_steps:
1. While playing a live game full screen, trigger the tvOS supported event on the other game via stringer
2. After triggered, wait for the Notification to appear
custom_expected:
The Notification appears as expected including:

* Associated Team Logo
* Expected Alert Text - http://gd.qa.mlb.com/components/game/mlb/notifications.json
* Watch Now button (not all caps as seen in screen below, however)

Design and position:
![](index.php?/attachments/get/3102)

title: Notification Triggered - Dismissed by Time Out
custom_preconds:
* QA build is installed and launched
* In the QA environment at least two video feeds are playable
* User is entitled to view both feeds with no blackouts blocking either one
* One of the feeds is being strung and a compatible event is about to occur
custom_steps:
1. While playing a live game full screen, trigger the tvOS supported event on the other game via stringer
2. After triggered, wait for the Notification to appear
custom_expected: Notification auto-dismisses after expected time (configurable - currently set to 10) animating to the right and off screen

title: Scores Off - View All Notifications
custom_preconds:
* QA build is installed and launched
* In Settings Hide Scores is set to ON
* In the QA environment at least two video feeds are playable
* User is entitled to view both feeds with no blackouts blocking either one
* One of the feeds is being strung and a compatible event is about to occur
custom_steps:
1. While playing a live game full screen, trigger the tvOS supported event on the other game via stringer
2. After triggered, wait for the Notification to appear
3. Observe modified Hide Scores On version of the Notification
4. Repeat steps 1-3 for each supported Notification type
custom_expected:
* A Notification appears
* The Notification will not display the Team, Player, Inning or Score information - only the event will be indicated

title: Notification Triggered - User selecting the notification is brought to the video feed in question.
Entitled / All ON
custom_preconds:
* QA build is installed and launched
* In the QA environment at least two video feeds are playable
* User is entitled to view both feeds with no blackouts blocking either one
* One of the feeds is being strung and a compatible event is about to occur
* User is viewing the other game
custom_steps: Trigger each supported Notification
custom_expected: Confirm each supported Notification type appears when all supported Notifications are set to On

title: Entitled / One ON
custom_preconds:
* QA build is installed and launched
* User has only one of the Notifications set to On
* In the QA environment at least two video feeds are playable
* User is entitled to view both feeds with no blackouts blocking either one
* One of the feeds is being strung and a compatible event is about to occur
* User is viewing the other game
custom_steps:
1. Trigger the Notification and observe - do not string further, let the notification stay up
2. Exit playback and navigate to Settings > Notifications 
3. Turn the current On Notification to Off 
4. Turn a different Notification to On
5. Confirm current Notification does not display when Off
6. Set up next notification type
7. Repeat steps 1-6 until all supported Notifications are seen
custom_expected: Confirm each supported Notification type appears when only the specific Notification is set to On

title: Free Account - On/Off
custom_preconds:
* QA build is installed and launched
* User has only one of the alerts set to On
* In the QA environment at least two video feeds are playable
* User is entitled to view both feeds with no blackouts blocking either one (both must be FGoD or MLB Plus)
* One of the feeds is being strung and a compatible event is about to occur
* User is viewing the other game
custom_steps:
1. Trigger the Notification and observe - - do not dismiss, do not string further, let the notification stay up
2. Exit playback and navigate to Settings > In-game alerts 
3. Turn the current On alert to Off 
4. Relaunch other game (not being strung) and wait > 2 mins
custom_expected:
Confirm alert type appears only when it is set to On
AND does not appear when set to off

title: Single Team Account - On/Off
custom_preconds:
* QA build is installed and launched
* User has only one of the Notifications set to On
* In the QA environment at least two video feeds are playable
* User is entitled to view both feeds with no blackouts blocking either one (both must be FGoD, MLB Plus or the team attached to user's account)
* One of the feeds is being strung and a compatible event is about to occur
* User is viewing the other game
custom_steps:
1. Trigger the Notification and observe - - do not dismiss, do not string further, let the notification stay up
2. Exit playback and navigate to Settings > In-game alerts 
3. Turn the current On alert to Off 
4. Relaunch other game (not being strung) and wait > 2 mins
custom_expected:
Confirm alert type appears only when it is set to On
AND does not appear when set to off

title: Exec Account - On/Off
custom_preconds:
* QA build is installed and launched
* User has only one of the Notifications set to On
* In the QA environment at least two video feeds are playable
* The feed being strung is blacked out for Premium users (exec can bypass) and the ON event is about to occur
* User is viewing the other game
custom_steps:
1. Trigger the Notification and observe - - do not dismiss, do not string further, let the notification stay up
2. Exit playback and navigate to Settings > In-game alerts 
3. Turn the current On alert to Off 
4. Relaunch other game (not being strung) and wait > 2 mins
custom_expected:
Confirm alert type appears only when it is set to On
AND does not appear when set to off

title: Notifications Hidden - Blackout
custom_preconds:
* QA build is installed and launched
* In the QA environment at least two video feeds are playable
* User is entitled to view both feeds 
* One feed is blacked out, the other is viewable
* The feed being strung is blacked out and a compatible event is about to occur
custom_steps:
1. While playing a live game full screen, trigger the tvOS supported event on the blacked out game via stringer
2. After triggered, wait for the Notification to appear
custom_expected: Notification does not appear

title: Notifications Hidden - Free Account, not entitled
custom_preconds:
* QA build is installed and launched
* In the QA environment at least two video feeds are playable
* One of the two feeds is FGoD or MLB Plus (viewable with a free account)
* The feed being strung is not free out and a compatible event is about to occur
custom_steps:
1. While playing the live game full screen, trigger the tvOS supported event on the other non-free game via stringer
2. After triggered, wait for the Notification to appear
custom_expected: Notification does not appear

title: Notifications Hidden - Single Team Account, not entitled
custom_preconds:
* QA build is installed and launched
* In the QA environment at least two video feeds are playable
* One of the two feeds is FGoD, MLB Plus or the team associated with the user's Single Team account
* The feed being strung is not free or entitled for user's Single Team account and a compatible event is about to occur
custom_steps:
1. While playing the live game full screen, trigger the tvOS supported event on the other non-free game via stringer
2. After triggered, wait for the Notification to appear
custom_expected: Notification does not appear

title: Notifications Hidden - Kill Switch [BRANDON TO REVISIT THIS - WILL REDUCE TESTS]
custom_preconds:
* QA build is installed but not launched
* In the QA environment at least two video feeds are playable
* User is entitled to view both feeds 
* One of the feeds can be strung in QA to trigger events
* Dev is in contact and can turn off any of the supported Notifications via the Kill Switch
custom_steps:
1. Request Dev turn off one of the supported Notifications via the Kill Switch
2. Launch App
3. Nav to Settings > Notifications and observe choices
4. Nav to Games View and launch the game NOT being strung (to trigger events)
5. While playing the live game full screen, trigger a compatible event that has been turned off * Dev is in contact and can turn off any of the supported Notifications via the Kill Switch
6. Confirm alert has been sent: http://gd.qa.mlb.com/components/game/mlb/notifications.json
7. Wait for the Notification to appear
8. Ask dev to return Notification and turn off a different one via the external config Kill Switch
9. Reboot app
10. Repeat Steps 3-9 until all Notifications have been removed and tested during playback
custom_expected:
* Notification removed via the Kill Switch does not appear in Settings > Notifications
* Notification removed via the Kill Switch does not appear when playing Video

title: Video Playback: Wired Connection Lost ***

AND the HTML5 device is connected to a wired network connection

AND the HTML5 device is connected to an Ad Hoc wifi network

AND the HTML5 device is connected to an Ad Hoc wifi network
